title: Why are people against the further postponement of the JEE and the NEET? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pressure is most common reason. If you are eagerly waiting for an exam,for that you have been preparing since 2 years or more. You don't want postponement for 3 times,even a single time. It builds a mental pressure and you are getting frustrated. You have been told to sit in a room and study,you don't know when it comes to end. It is very easy to say why people's are against furthur postponement but think about students. They are reading same thing for almost 3-4 time,they got fed up with this.

How many months being make sit in house playing games in phone, if Corona does not go for 2 years, u ask postponed jee, Neet to postpone for 2 years, people must live with Corona or go to another planet, Corona started in China, do we expect this much happening to India, iif u believe it disappears by 3 or 4 months, humans always guess past or present but not future, same way as time being slowly Corona vanishes by September or October, up to now any virus in world has got end or not, same way Corona also has some end, how to to be safe from Corona washing hands, social distance, if people forget this after 6 months also ur not safe , as vaccine may come to India Mass production of 100 crore, it takes January to March 2021, upto their what u do in house, biting nails
